name: Serpent's Claw: Pixel Version
description:
Serpent's Claw was made in a week for two game jams: the RNDGAME JAM II and the Bored Pixel Jam 8. You are Adam the Serpent and must eat as many people as possible while avoiding the heroic knight.

Left key - Move left

Right key - Move right

Up key - Move up

Down key - Move down
